items.sentence: I\'m going on a picnic with my friends next weekend.
I\'ve got to go to the office for a few hours today.
I\'ve gotten kind of used to doing things by myself.
Tom accepted the invitation to attend Mary\'s party.
Instead of going to Boston, I want to go to Chicago.
I didn\'t think Tom was going to be able to do that.
I don\'t believe I can walk that far in three hours.
I think that this tie will go great with that shirt.
I think that you were better looking with long hair.
It looks like Tom and Mary are going to get married.
